## System Capabilities

### What It Stores
- Full conversation transcripts
- Uploaded documents and analysis
- Strategy documents and business plans
- Contact lists and reference materials
- Research findings and recommendations

### What It Enables
- True conversation continuity across sessions
- Searchable knowledge base of past interactions
- Reference to previous analysis and decisions
- Consistent information across multiple conversations

### Limitations
- Requires user to provide specific URLs for retrieval
- Read-only access (cannot write new information)
- Dependent on system availability and health

This persistent memory system transforms Claude from a stateless assistant into one with genuine memory and knowledge continuity.
